item.title: The Devil Wears Prada to the next Live Meeting
item.description: For a long time I’ve followed the same routing on Christmas day: Wake up, unwrap presents, have breakfast, watch a movie, visit relatives. Of course, over time, things have changed slightly. Most notably, the time I wake up, that fact most presents are actually opened the night before, breakfast became brunch and most of my relatives now live a 14-hour flight away. Movie time didn’t change, though, and today’s was The Devil Wears Prada.
